boardgame.name: Zombicide: Black Plague
Zombicide: Černý mor
Zombicide: Czarna Plaga
boardgame.description: Description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Zombicide: Black Plague takes the zombie apocalypse into a fantastical medieval setting! The arcane powers of the Necromancers have unleashed a zombie invasion in the age of swords and sorcery, and it's up to your group of straggling survivors to not only stay alive during these dark times, but to take back the realm and punish those responsible for the apocalypse!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Zombicide: Black Plague allows you take control of paladins, dwarves, knights, and magicians, wielding powerful swords, crossbows, and even magic spells to defeat the zombie hordes and its Necromancer overlords. The classic Zombicide rules have been revamped for this new incarnation of the game, while still retaining the nonstop action, tense atmosphere and easy-to-learn rules that made Zombicide a classic. Equip your survivor with equipment like chainmail armor or shields to defend against the undead, pick up spell books to perform fantastic enchantments, or light up a pool of dragon bile to create an all-consuming inferno of dragon fire!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Take on the zombie invasion from the medieval streets to secret vaults that create quick passages through the citadel (and often hold special artifacts). Chase down the elusive Necromancers to keep them from multiplying the zombie masses. And tackle a whole new set of missions through which your group of survivors will become the heroes of the land (or the last victims of the zombie massacre)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: ***THIS IS FOR A PIGGY-BACK/PRE-ORDER*** The game is tentatively scheduled to arrive in December, 2015 (but more likely in early 2016, based on prior CMON performance). If you missed the Kickstarter, I am offering a piggy-back service. This listing is for a full set of the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Knight_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Pledge Level with *all* stretch goals. (please see the Kickstarter Page for a full list of what_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s included). If you wish to add any add-ons, please let me know in advance, and we can discuss pricing details. For those who live in the San Francisco Bay Area, I am happy to arrange a local pick-up. For everyone else, shipping will be calculated once the Z: BP order arrives, and I can determine the final shipping weight. As always, I will offer multiple shipping options, and only charge actual postage costs.

***THIS IS FOR A PIGGY-BACK/PRE-ORDER*** The game is tentatively scheduled to arrive in February, 2016. If you missed the Kickstarter, I am offering a piggy-back service. Please note that the price for this listing includes shipping from CMON to me (about $22 per pledge!), but does NOT include shipping from me to you. Shipping from me to you will be calculated once the Z: BP order arrives, and I can determine the final shipping weight. As always, I will offer multiple shipping options, and only charge actual postage costs. For those who live in the San Francisco Bay Area, I am happy to arrange a local pick-up.

Zombicide: Black Plague is a standalone cooperative boardgame for 1 to 6 players that brings the relentless zombie-killing action of Zombicide into a brand new fantasy setting! Players control a party of survivors as they fight to rid the land of an invasion of zombies controlled by the game itself. Survivors find weapons, learn spells, battle zombies, and gain experience.
